Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Headache Disorders/Headache Disorders, Secondary/Vascular Headaches
Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Cerebrovascular Disorders/Vascular Headaches
Record.Description: Secondary headache disorders attributed to a variety of cranial or cervical vascular disorders, such as BRAIN ISCHEMIA; INTRACRANIAL HEMORRHAGES; and CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM VASCULAR MALFORMATIONS.
